title: About Our School
description: Discover the story, values, and vision that make AIC Sengani Girls High School a center of excellence in education.
historyContent:
AIC Sengani Girls High School was established as part of the Africa Inland Church's commitment to providing quality education to young women in Kenya. Founded with a vision to empower girls through education, the school has grown from humble beginnings to become one of the respected educational institutions in Machakos County.

Located in the serene environment of Tala town in Matungulu Sub-County, the school has expanded over the years to accommodate its growing student population, which now stands at approximately 840-960 students. The school's development has been marked by continuous improvement in infrastructure, academic programs, and extracurricular offerings.
missionContent: To provide quality education that nurtures the intellectual, physical, social, and spiritual development of young women, empowering them to become responsible leaders and contributors to society.
visionContent: To be a center of excellence in holistic education, producing well-rounded individuals who can contribute positively to society and reach their full potential in all areas of life.

valuesList.name: Excellence
valuesList.description: We strive for the highest standards in all aspects of education and character development.

valuesList.name: Integrity
valuesList.description: We uphold honesty, transparency, and ethical conduct in all our interactions.

valuesList.name: Respect
valuesList.description: We value the dignity and worth of every individual in our community.

valuesList.name: Responsibility
valuesList.description: We encourage accountability for one's actions and decisions.

valuesList.name: Service
valuesList.description: We foster a spirit of giving back to the community and serving others.
